meanings.definition: The posterior part of the alimentary canal in some invertebrates and vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The hindgut helps in the digestion process.
meanings.sent2: Food moves from the midgut to the hindgut for further processing.
meanings.sent3: The hindgut decided to take a break from digesting food.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the hindgut of a horse.
meanings.sent5: The hindgut, like a hardworking employee, diligently processes waste.

meanings.definition: The part of the alimentary canal between the midgut and the anus.
meanings.sent1: After the midgut, food enters the hindgut for final processing.
meanings.sent2: The hindgut plays a crucial role in absorbing water from digested food.
meanings.sent3: The hindgut and the midgut had a friendly competition on food processing.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like the hindgut, slowly absorbing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The hindgut, a vital link in the digestive system, completes the digestion process.
